author: senh
title: Climbing the Matterhorn: Step by Step
text: BING NEWS: Climbing the Matterhorn: Step by Step ZERMATT, Switzerland — I was in over my head. This realization came to me 13,780 feet up the Matterhorn, the pyramid-shaped peak that reigns over this 13th-century farming village turned glamorous ski resort in southwest Switzerland. It was 8 a.m. on a ... 10/12/2015 - 8:18 pm | View Link Mountaineers Lit the Matterhorn to Celebrate 150 Years of Climbing The Matterhorn is one of the highest peaks in the Alps, and its successful ascent in 1865 marked the end of the Golden Age of mountain climbing. August climb up the Normal route on Mont Blanc or the Matterhorn.
